mapper.select: select u.id, u.login, u.full_name, u.password, r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, f.id as faculty_id, f.name as faculty_name from users u left join roles r on u.id_roles = r.id left join facultys f on u.id_facultys = f.id where u.login = #{login}
